events.message: I received my order yesterday, but it was the wrong item. I would like to request a refund because I do not want to keep it.
Classified the issue as a refund request due to wrong item received, matching customer complaint details.
Support agent Maria has been assigned to handle the refund request for this case.
Hello, I’m Maria from Customer Support. I’m sorry to hear you received the wrong item. I’m here to help you with the refund process.
Could you please provide a photo of the item you received and the packaging to help us verify the issue?
Sure, I have attached pictures of the item and the box it came in. Please let me know if you need anything else.
Thank you for the photos. We will process your refund immediately and you should see the amount back in your account within 5-7 business days.
Thanks for the quick response and refund process! I appreciate how fast you handled this.
We have completed the refund process on our side and marked the issue as resolved. Please reach out if you need further assistance.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received the refund and if everything is satisfactory on your end.
Yes, I have received the refund in my bank account today. Thank you again for your excellent service!
Closing this case as the refund has been successfully received and the customer is satisfied with the resolution.
A satisfaction survey has been sent to the customer to gather feedback about their support experience.
